channel.title: Adding combat leval needed to be go into the portal

item.title: Adding combat leval needed to be go into the portal
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Under ‘case 12260:’

Add:

if (combat >= 100) {

Then Above:

sendMessage("You need 100 combat to play this mini-game. By BamBam");

Add this:

} else {

And before the ‘break;’, add a ‘}’.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding combat leval needed to be go into the portal

item.title: Adding combat leval needed to be go into the portal
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

case 12260: teleportToX = 2399; teleportToY = 5169; sendMessage("You need 100 combat to play this mini-game. By BamBam"); break;

I want you to need to have 100 combat to enter this portal

Read full topic
